pkgmetadata.longdescription: Computing Response Similarity Indices for Multiple-Choice Tests // Contains several IRT and non-IRT based response similarity indices proposed in the literature for multiple-choice examinations such as the Omega index, Wollack (1997) doi:10.1177/01466216970214002; Generalized Binomial Test, van der Linden Sotaridona (2006) doi:10.3102/10769986031003283; K index, K1 and K2 indices, Sotaridona Meijer (2002) doi:10.1111/j.1745-3984.2002.tb01138.x; and S1 and S2 indices, Sotaridona Meijer (2003) doi:10.1111/j.1745-3984.2003.tb01096.x.
